posts.post_title: **SOLD** FS: N172 Old Judge Clark Griffith 201-4
posts.post_content: I’m working on another Old Judge purchase, so I’ve got this N172 Clark Griffith (HOF) 201-4 SGC 2 card for sale. Asking $1,750 PayPal FF shipped.
